//   ----------------------- ----- ----

//   ShadowFadeFraction      c11      1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture      s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.999000013, 1, -1, 0
    def c6, 0.0915749967, 0.120879002, 0.150183007, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_569B56F6_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r7, c220.z, s13
mov r8.xyw, v0
add r7.w, r8.w, -r7.y
mad r8.x, r7.w, r7.x, r8.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r8.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r8.x
      mov r1.yz, r8.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r8.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r8.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r8.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.z, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_569B56F6_0.txt
add r7.w, r0.x, -r7.y
mad r0.y, -r7.w, r7.x, r0.y

    mad r1, c7, r0.y, r1
    mad r0, c9, r0.x, r1
    add r0, r0, c10
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul r1.xy, r0.w, r0
    min r2.z, r0.z, c5.x
    mov r3.yzw, c5
    mul r4, r3.yyzz, c0.xyxy
    mad_pp r5, r0.xyxy, r0.w, r4.zwxw
    mad r2.xyw, r5.xyzx, c5.yyzw, c5.wwzy
    texldp_pp r6, r2, s2
    mad r2.xyw, r5.zwzx, c5.yyzw, c5.wwzy
    texldp r5, r2, s2
    mul r0.z, r5.x, c6.x
    mad_pp r0.z, r6.x, c6.x, r0.z
    mad_pp r4, r0.xyxy, r0.w, r4.zyxy
    mov_pp r2.xy, r4
    texldp r5, r2, s2
    mad_pp r0.z, r5.x, c6.x, r0.z
    mov_pp r2.xy, r4.zwzw
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    mad_pp r0.z, r4.x, c6.x, r0.z
    mul r4, r3.ywwy, c0.xxxy
    mad_pp r2.xy, r0, r0.w, r4
    texldp r5, r2, s2
    mad_pp r0.z, r5.x, c6.y, r0.z
    mad_pp r2.xy, r0, r0.w, -r4
    texldp r5, r2, s2
    mad_pp r0.z, r5.x, c6.y, r0.z
    mad_pp r2.xy, r0, r0.w, r4.zwzw
    texldp r5, r2, s2
    mad_pp r0.z, r5.x, c6.y, r0.z
    mad_pp r2.xy, r0, r0.w, -r4.zwzw
    texldp r4, r2, s2
    mad_pp r0.x, r4.x, c6.y, r0.z
    mov r1.zw, r2
    texldp r1, r1, s2
    mad_pp r0.x, r1.x, c6.z, r0.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.x, c5.z
    mad_pp r0.x, c11.x, r0.x, r3.y
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    rcp_pp oC0, r0.x

// approximately 69 instruction slots used (12 texture, 57 arithmetic)
